messages.subject: My kids
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Pam S. You said what I needed to hear. My kids are mine and their temperments unique. They have valued traits. My 3rd is that easy going type you
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Pam S. You said what I needed to hear. My kids are mine and their
temperments unique. They have valued traits. My 3rd is that easy going type
you mentioned. In her I see compliance, calm, already at 2. The book you
mentioned sounds good, I have never heard of it before. Again, thank you.

Yesterday Riley and I went to play tennis at the courts. He has asked to do
this with me for a few days. We finally found the time during Ashley's play
practice. We spent 15 minutes or so hitting the ball over the net. He did
not once yell at me that I was hitting it wrong, as he has done in the past.
We played until he tired then dunked our sweaty heads under the water
faucet. A complete joyful experience for both of us. Hurry.

Talk to you soon, Mary
